resources.string: Barathiyar/Barathidasan strong lines at somepoint created a deep impact in our life. Let\'s Check our knowledge about the creator of those lines.
" Kaatruveliyidai Kannamma Nindran Kaadhalai Yenni Kalikkindren Amudhootrinai Otha Idhazhgalum Nilavoori Thadhumbum Vizhigalum"
" Engal Vaazhvum Engal Valamum Mangatha Tamizhendru Sangae Muzhangu! Engal Pagaivar Engo Marainthar Ingulla Tamizhargal Ondraathal Kande!"

" Summa Kedantha Nethai Kothi Sombal illama Yer Nadathi Kamma Karaiya Osathi katti Karumbu Kollaiyil Vaaikaal Vetti Samba Payira Pudingi Nattu Thaguntha Muraiyil Thaneer Vittu
Nellu Velachiruku - Varappum Ulla Marainchiruku"
" Avalum Naanum Amuthum Tamizhum Avalum Naanum Alaiyum Kadalum Avalum Naanum Thavmum Arulum Avalum Naanum Verum Maramum"
" Tamizhukum Amuthendru Per - Antha Tamil Inba Tamil Engal Uyiruku Ner!"
" Paayumoli Nee Ennaku, Paarkumvizhi Naan Unaku Thoyumathu Nee Ennaku, Thumbiadi Naan Unaku"
" Enthaiyum Thaaiyum Mazhinthu Kulaavi Irunthathum Innaadae - Athan Munthaiyar Aayiram Aandugal Vazhnthu Mudinthathum Innaadae"
" Thayin Manikodi Paarir - Athai Thazhnthu Paninthu Pugazhnthida Vaareer"
" Thoongum Puliyai Pirai kondu Ezhupinom Thooya Tamizharai Tamil Kondu Ezhupinom"

" Theertha Karaiyinilae Therku Moolaiyil Senbaga Thotathilae Paarthirunthal Varuven Venillavilae Paangiyodenru Sonnai Vaarthai Thavari Vittai Adi Kannama Maarbu Thudikuthadi Paartha Edathiellam Unnai Poi Paavai Theriyuthadi"
You are ready to play again!!!
Tamil Kaaththa Perumai Ummai Serum!!! Kudos!!!
Vazhga Tamil Velga Tamizhagam Tamil Singam Nee!!!
Ayyo Ivangalam Nammbi Tamil Valakka Solitu Setha En Paatan Enga? Dei Paata iruda varen???
Tamiluku Vantha Sothanaiya Paarunga Makkalae...intha 1 mark vechu nee enna panapora illa naanthan enna panaporen??
Neelaam Tamil Quiz Atten Pannalanu Yaaru Azhutha Apidiyae Phone ah potu Thirumbipakkama odipoiru....
